name: Gogo Boba
description:
Grow and breed a garden of Goga plants and serve them as boba in your cafe!

After finding a mysterious seed and notes left behind by your grandmother, you learn that the fruit produced by the Goga plant is perfect for making boba in your cafe!

Goga plants grows with enough watering and love and care. Each Goga plant will produce a Goga fruit based on the plant's genes. Plants can also be cross-pollinated to achieve different gene combinations!

Controls

This game is meant for mouse/keyboard.

Click on menu items and on areas in the garden to interact.

When in the garden, use the number hotkeys to select an action.

Esc key - Settings menu

Credits

Jetpackgone - programmer, co-writer

Gotodo - artist, co-writer
